item.title: Less is more: UC Berkeley and Google unlock LLM potential through simple sampling
item.description: With multiple sampling and self-verification, Gemini 1.5 Pro can outperform o1-preview in reasoning tasks.

item.title: Small models as paralegals: LexisNexis distills models to build AI assistant
item.description: LexisNexis fine-tuned Mistral models to build its Protege AI assistant, relying on distilled and small models for its AI platform.

item.title: OpenAI’s new voice AI model gpt-4o-transcribe lets you add speech to your existing text apps in seconds
item.description: Three, all new proprietary voice models called gpt-4o-transcribe, gpt-4o-mini-transcribe and gpt-4o-mini-tts.

item.title: Speed is King: How Google’s $32B Wiz play rewrites DevOps security rules
item.description: The real story behind Google acquiring Wiz is how the need for speed and better cloud security dominates every enterprise’s devops cycles.

item.title: Anthropic just gave Claude a superpower: real-time web search. Here’s why it changes everything
item.description: Anthropic launches real-time web search for Claude AI, challenging ChatGPT's dominance while securing $3.5 billion in funding at a $61.5 billion valua...
